entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 07:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
